arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town v Accrington Stanley RECAP: Ryan Bowman seals much-needed win for Robins
arts.sum: Cheltenham Town hit back from a goal down at half-time to claim a much-needed home win over Accrington Stanley, with goals from substitute Manni Norkett and the recalled Ryan Bowman. Cheltenham Town: Evans; Kinsella, Stubbs, Bradbury, Shipley; Bennett (Norkett 59), Pett, Young; Archer; Colwill (Laing 84); Bowman.

arts.ttl: Manni Norkett and Ryan Bowman goals help Cheltenham come back to beat Accrington
Apology to fans after a day to forget and another injury blow - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after Fleetwood Town defeat
arts.sum: Goals change games and that's exactly what's happened here today. You said you players have been outfought and are not necessarily looking in the mirror after performances
